plugin.name: aard_damage_window
plugin.author: Sath/Claude
plugin.purpose: Combines multiple lines of output into a single line, displayed in a miniwindow.
plugin.description:
** Damage Window - Spam Reduction Plugin ** Combines multiple lines of MUD output into condensed summaries. ** Output is displayed in a dedicated miniwindow.
Commands: spamwin show - Show the miniwindow spamwin hide - Hide the miniwindow spamwin clear - Clear the miniwindow contents spamwin echo - Toggle echoing to main window (on/off) spamreduce combine - List all combine options spamreduce combine <option> - Toggle a specific option

trigger.match: WFLAGS Hide weapon flag messages (flaming, vorpal, etc) *

trigger.name: death_pointless
trigger.match: That was a pointless no-experience kill!

trigger.name: death_mob_mind
trigger.match: ^(?!\()(?P<mob>.+) falls dead as \w+ mind is destroyed[^']+$

trigger.name: death_mob_drain
trigger.match: ^(?!\()(?P<mob>.+) howls as \w+ last spark of life is drained[^']+$

trigger.name: death_mob_pale
trigger.match: ^(?!\()(?P<mob>.+) turns deadly pale and collapses[^']+$

trigger.name: death_mob_acid
trigger.match: ^(?!\()(?P<mob>.+) screams in agony as the acid consumes [^']+$

trigger.name: death_mob_holy
trigger.match: ^(?!\()(?P<mob>.+) is damned forever by the holy power[^']+$

trigger.name: death_mob_fire
trigger.match: ^(?!\()(?P<mob>.+) screams as the flames engulf [^']+$

trigger.name: death_mob_water
trigger.match: ^(?!\()(?P<mob>.+) is battered to death by the force of the water[^']+$

trigger.name: death_mob_earth
trigger.match: ^(?!\()(?P<mob>.+) crumbles as \w+ is battered to death[^']+$

trigger.name: death_mob_lightning
trigger.match: ^(?!\()(?P<mob>.+) smoulders as the lightning destroys [^']+$

trigger.name: death_mob_god
trigger.match: ^The voice of god has cleansed (?P<mob>.+) eternally.+DEAD.+$

trigger.name: death_mob_mindforce
trigger.match: ^The mind force crushes (?P<mob>.+) into a bloody pulp.+DEAD.+$

trigger.name: death_mob_desolate
trigger.match: ^(?!\()(?P<mob>.+) feels so desolate that life itself leaves \w+ wrecked form.+DEAD[^']+$

trigger.name: death_mob_fabric
trigger.match: ^The very fabric of the world rejects (?P<mob>.+?) and .+ life is over.+DEAD.+$

trigger.name: death_mob_letsout
trigger.match: ^(?!\()(?P<mob>.+) lets out .+DEAD[^']+$

trigger.name: death_mob_slain
trigger.match: ^(?!\()(?P<mob>.+) is slain by a final [^']+$

trigger.name: death_other_exp
trigger.match: * receives * experience point*.

trigger.name: death_exp
trigger.match: ^You(?: (don't))? receive ([\d\+]+)(?: 'rare kill')?(?: bonus)? experience (?:points?|bonus)(?: courtesy of .*| to celebrate .*| to rejoice in the death of another million mobs| in honor of .*| from your daily blessing)?[\.\!](?: \:\))?$

trigger.name: death_is_noexp
trigger.match: You have set your character to receive no experience point*!

trigger.name: death_daily_exp_remaining
trigger.match: ^(?:Daily bonus exp not used\. )?You have (\d+|no) (?:daily blessing )?bonus experience kills? remaining\.$

trigger.name: death_campaign
trigger.match: Congratulations, that was one of your CAMPAIGN mobs!

trigger.name: death_gq
trigger.match: Congratulations, that was one of the GLOBAL QUEST mobs!

trigger.name: death_gq_kills
trigger.match: You can be rewarded for * more global quest kill* this level.

trigger.name: death_gq_qp
trigger.match: 3 quest points awarded.

trigger.name: death_quest
trigger.match: ^QUEST: You have almost completed your QUEST!$|^Return to the questmaster before your time runs out\.$

trigger.name: death_other_vampire
trigger.match: * drinks thirstily from *.

trigger.name: death_vampire
trigger.match: ^You bury your fangs deep into .*, drinking thirstily\.$|^Ahhhh, that feels better!$

trigger.name: death_sacrifice
trigger.match: ^(.*) gives you (\d+) gold coins? for (.*)\.$

trigger.name: death_sacrifice_none
trigger.match: ^(.*) is not impressed with (.*)\.$

trigger.name: death_other_sacrifice
trigger.match: ^\w+ sacrifices the .*corpse of .* to .*\.$

trigger.name: death_other_split
trigger.match: * shares * gold coins with *. Your share is * gold.

trigger.name: death_split
trigger.match: You share * gold coins with * other *. Your share is * gold.

trigger.name: death_gold
trigger.match: You get * gold coins from *.

trigger.name: death_gold_daily
trigger.match: Your daily blessing added * gold to the corpse.

trigger.name: death_daily_gold_remaining
trigger.match: ^You have (\d+) daily blessing bonus gold kills? remaining.$

trigger.name: death_gold_clan_tax
trigger.match: You are taxed * gold coin* by your clan.

trigger.name: death_loot
trigger.match: You get * from the *.

trigger.name: death_crumble
trigger.match: * crumbles into * gold pieces.

trigger.name: death_preserve_multiple
trigger.match: ^.* is too mesmerized at the explosion of Icefall to take a bite\!$|^You notice something very shiny in the corpse\!$|^.* exclaims \'If you\'re going to dissect me\, at least do it with a larger group\!\'$|^.* is too shocked at Icefall's gory remains to attack you!$|^.* hands .* some ICE for .* BURN!$|^.* burns .* after a hug! \[.*\]$|^.* reflects .* damage, injuring .*! \[.*\]$|^.* boggles 'How am I going to tank 50 of you if so few of you killed me\?!'$|^.* pops a balloon, injuring .*! \[.*\]$|^.* bites .* one last time! \[.*\]$|^.* boggles 'My destiny was to die from an epic powerup train! What's this\?!'$|^.* kicks .* with .* boot! \[.*\]$|^.* exclaims 'If you're going to dissect me, at least do it with a larger group!'$|^.* smacks .* before dying! \[.*\]$

trigger.name: lotus_amount
trigger.match: Wow....what a rush! [*]

trigger.name: lotus_max
trigger.match: ^Your concentration is now at its peak\.$|^Your concentration is already at its peak\.$

trigger.name: equip
trigger.match: ^You (?:equip|wear) (?<equip2_item>.+) (?:as a|on your|around your) (?<equip2_slot>.+)\.$|^You proudly pin (?<equip_pin_item>.+) to your chest\.$|^You wield (?<equip_secondary_item>.+) in your off\-hand\.$|^You wield (?<equip_wielded_item>.+)\.$|^(?<equip_aura_item>.+) begins floating above you\.$|^(?<equip_float_item>.+) begins floating around you\.$|^You light (?<equip_light_item>.+) and hold it\.$

trigger.name: remove_from_keyring
trigger.match: You remove * from your keyring.

trigger.name: remove
trigger.match: ^You (?:stop using|remove) (?<remove2_item>.+) (?:as a|from your|from around your) (?<remove2_slot>.+)\.$|^You stop wielding (?<remove_wielded_item>.+) in your primary hand\.$|^You stop wielding (?<remove_secondary_item>.+) in your off\-hand\.$|^(?<remove_float_item>.+) stops floating around you\.$|^(?<remove_aura_item>.+) stops floating above you\.$|^You remove your (?<remove_sleeping_item>.+)\.$|^You remove (?<remove_light_item>.+), making the room a little darker\.$

trigger.name: spellup
trigger.match: Queueing spell : *.

trigger.name: where_area
trigger.match: You are in area : *

trigger.name: where_creator
trigger.match: Area created by : *

trigger.name: where_range
trigger.match: Level range is : *

trigger.name: where_players
trigger.match: Players near you:

trigger.name: combat_immune
trigger.match: ^(?:\[(\d+)\] )?(.*) is unaffected by your (.*)\!$

trigger.name: combat_force_multiple
trigger.match: ^.* heals .*self\.$|^Acidic poison severely impairs your senses\.$|^.* fails to curse .*\.$|^.* entangled in an invisible web\.$|^.* web fails to take hold of .*\.$|^You can\'t see a thing\!$|^.* kicks? dirt in .* eyes\!$|^The stench is incredible\, you feel faint and weak\!$|^.* dazes? .*\, slamming into .* like a tank\.$|^It tears at your existence and you feel extremely vulnerable\.$|^.* hits? .* with a massive blow\, leaving .* stunned\!$|^.* dazes? .* with a mind\-numbing headbutt\!$|^The venom destroys your combat ability\. You feel dizzy\.$|^.* flesh is ripped from .* body\.$|^You feel your strength slip away\.$|^You are weak and BLIND\!$|^\* jumps? in to defend .*\!$|^.* exclaims? \'Your level is of no interest to me .*\; I will kill you anyway\!\'$|^.* says? \'Your purity sickens me\, .*\.\'$

trigger.name: combat_preserve_multiple
trigger.match: ^You block .* way as .* attempts? to flee\.$|^.* restores? life to .*self\.$|^You are shocked by .*\.$|^.* drains? life from .*\.$|^.* (try|tries) to disarm .*, but fails?\.$|^.* fails? to stun .* and .* in an attack\!$|^.* fails? to blind .*\.$|^.* fails to hex .*\!$|^.* slime tears at .* soul\!$|^.* begins to spin around\, flailing wildly\.$|^.* hurls? a barrage of searing white blades at .*\!$|^A black field of death emanates from .*\.$|^.* slams .* head sideways into .*\. OUCH\! That smarts\!$|^.* jams .* fingers into .* eyes, causing .* searing pain\.$|^.* chokes as .* breathes in the poison\.$|^.* sweeps your legs from under you\!$|^A deep aura of dread settles around .*\.$|^.* catch(es)? .* completely off-guard and inflicts? massive damage on .*\.$|^.* gets? a raged look in .* eyes\.$|^.* fails? to interfere with .* healing\.$|^.* screams? wildly and attacks? .*\.$|^.* with a series of hammering blows\!$|^.* black root smashes into you and you lose control of your senses\.$|^.* shoots? .* beam from .* hand straight towards .*\!$|^.* is poisoned by the venom on .*\.$|^.* raises .* and starts yelling KAI\-HA\!$|^.* yells KAI\-HA and then strikes .* torso\.$|^.* is frozen by .*\.$|^.* is burned by .*\.$|^.* eyes are seared by .*\.$|^.* spirit shield reflects .* back at .*\!$|^.* turns blue and shivers\.$|^.* gets a wild look in .* eyes\.$|^.* calls down rains of fire\!$|^.* screams? wildly and (try|tries) to cleave .* in half\!$|^A green mist emanates from .*\. The mist surrounds you\.$|^A green mist emanates from .* towards .*\.$|^.* a chilling cloud of ice\.$|^.* chants the phrase \'.*\'\.$|^.* bites .* on .* neck\.$|^.* hurls .* at .*, slamming into .* like a tank\.$|^\* breathes forth a huge blast of fire\.$|^.* calls the justice of .* to strike .* foes\!$|^.* fails to weaken .*\.$|^.* sprays .* with .*Kobold glands\.$|^.* failed to kick dirt into .* eyes\!$|^You feel a brief tingling sensation\.$|^.* sprays .* with acidic raven venom\.$|^.* touches .* with venomous hydra\'s blood\.$|^You feel momentarily ill\, but it passes\.$|^.* unleashes a blast of atomic energy on the room\.$|^.* smacks? .* with a solid uppercut\!$|^.* sends? .* sprawling with a powerful bash\!$|^.* conjures? a storm of freezing snow and sleet\.$|^.* tries to jump into the air\, realizes .* is already flying\, and kicks .* in the face instead\!$|^.* touch of nature heals .* wounds\.$|^You create a time shift and calmly step away from .* attack\.$|^You dodge .* attack\.$|^You are unaffected by .* dispel .*\.$|^You get lucky and manage to escape .* attack\.$|^You counter\-strike .* attack\!$|^You parry .* attack\.$|^You instinctively dodge .* attack\.$|^.* holy rift protects you from .* attack\.$|^You glow with energy as you absorb .*\.$|^You blink out of existence and avoid .* attack\.$|^You sense divine intervention as .* attack narrowly misses you\.$|^You misdirect .* attack\.$|^You blend perfectly with your surroundings and avoid .* attack\.$|^.* dodges? your attack\.$|^.* counter\-strikes your attack\!$|^.* parries your attack\.$|^.* misdirects your attack\.$|^.* holy rift protects .* from your attack\.$|^.* avoids your attack\, almost too easily\.$|^.* blocks your attack with .* shield\.$|^.* blends in perfectly causing .* to hit nothing but air\.$|^.* blinks out of existence avoiding your attack\.$|^.* fiddles with time and your attack is just a few seconds slow\.$|^.* shimmers momentarily\.$|^.* is shocked by .*\.$|^You are frozen by .*\.$|^.* muscles stop responding\.$|^You feel your blood being drained\!$|^Suddenly\, after performing an incantation\, .* disappears\.$|^.* tries to slow .* down but fails\.$|^.* reappears behind .* and stabs .* in the back\!$|^.* circles around .* and stabs .* in the back\!$|^.* forms a deadly cloud of poison\.$|^You feel a little run down\, but it passes\.$|^You feel .* drawing your life away\.$|^You feel a momentary chill on your neck\.$|^Your power grip is too strong for .*\.$|^Your head throbs as your reality is torn apart\!$|^.* uses the power of the cobra against .*\.$|^.* poison tears at .* skin\, .* eyes stream in agony\.$|^.* hammers? you with a series of blows!$|^(.*?) breathes forth a huge blast of fire\.$|^Unseen forces protect you from (.*?) tangling web\.$|^You slash at .* ferociously with your razor\-sharp claws\!$|^You lunge forward gnashing at .* viciously\.$|^You spitefully bite (.*?) as if (.*?) tried to pet you more than three times\.$|^You attempt to bury .* deep into .* back\!$|^.* spins around .*, catching .* off guard, and executes a vicious triple backstab\.$|^.* begins to spin around with .* weapon outstretched\.$|^You stretch out your weapon and begin to spin violently\!$
